alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 2:02PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for... Southern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 202 PM CDT, Heavy rainfall due to thunderstorms may result in urban and small stream flooding. Additional heavy showers and thunderstorms are expected to develop and move into the area over the next few hours. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fairhope, Foley, Orange Beach, Robertsdale, Magnolia Springs, Bon Secour, Summerdale, Silverhill, Perdido Beach, Elberta, Miflin, Marlow, River Park, Clay City, Elsanor, Turkey Branch, Josephine, Barnwell, Caswell and Seminole. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
